posts.post_content:
cool! Always neat to see more reprints of any of these White Protection granting Instants! Protection at FIRST glance feels almost like Indestructible, and you wouldn't think you'd want it all over the place....

Posted By: Murmeldjuret (7/11/2013 8:58:12 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Best 1-mana instant in the game? Now, this is amazing, but it is nowhere near that honorific.  
  
[Lighning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lighning Bolt), [Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual), [Ancestral Recall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ancestral Recall), [Swords to Plowshares](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Swords to Plowshares), [Entomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Entomb), [Path to Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path to Exile), [Vampiric Tutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampiric Tutor), [Berserk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Berserk), and [High Tide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=High Tide) all have it beat. And there are probably many more which are superior in some people's opinions, but it would be very difficult to deny that the instants on that list are all worse than this card.
posts.html:
Best 1-mana instant in the game? Now, this is amazing, but it is nowhere near that honorific.

Lighning Bolt, Dark Ritual, Ancestral Recall, Swords to Plowshares, Entomb, Path to Exile, Vampiric Tutor, Berserk, and High Tide all have it beat. And there are probably many more which are superior in some people's opinions, but it would be very difficult to deny that the instants on that list are all worse than this card.
